dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Paper Title: string (''): The title of the associated paper.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Dataset URL: string (''): The URL to the dataset's original github repository, website, or best available resource.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.GitHub URL: string (''): The URL to the dataset's github repository.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Hugging Face URL: string (''): The URL to the dataset's main Hugging Face page.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Papers with Code URL: string (''): The URL to the dataset's (not the paper's) 'Papers with Code' page.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.ArXiv URL: string (''): The URL to the ArXiv abstract page if the dataset is accompanied by a paper.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Semantic Scholar Corpus ID: int (''): The 'Corpus ID' associated with the dataset's paper on semantic scholar.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Collection: string: The collection from which this version of the dataset is a part. Should be the name of this json file, without the .json extension.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Collection URL: string: The URL of the collection's github repository or website.
Languages: list[string]: A list of the natural or coding languages represented in the text.
Please use languages listed in `constants/language_groups.json` or add to it.
Task Categories: list[string]: A list of the tasks represented in the dataset.
Please use tasks listed in `constants/task_groups.json` or add to it.
Text Sources: list[string]: A list of sources from which the text was scraped/derived, including online/offline sources, if applicable.
Please use source URLs listed in `constants/domain_groups.json` or add to it.
Model Generated: list[str] (null): The model(s) used to generate this dataset if applicable.
Format: list[string]: A list of the formats in which the dataset is available.
Human Annotation: string: 'Yes' or 'No' indicating human annotations are part of this dataset, in addition to whatever was scraped from third-party sources.
Derived from Datasets: list[string]: A list of the names of ML datasets from which this dataset is comprised or derived.
Creators: list[string]: A list of the institutions/corporations (not people) creators/compiler of the ML dataset.
Please use organizations listed in `constants/creator_groups.json`, or add to it.

Licenses.License: string (''): The name of the license, taken from `constants/license_classes.json`.
Licenses.License URL: string (''): The URL to the webpage where this license is mentioned in association with this dataset.

dataset-name (must match unique identifi.License Notes: string (''): Any notes from the human annotator regarding the license information they retrieved.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.License Verified By: string (''): The name of the human annotator who verified the license information.
Dataset Filter IDs: list[string] (''): A list of the dataset filter IDs associated with the dataset.
applicable when the same collection has multiple sources and they need to be separated.
If no extra filter id is needed, please put the unique identifier of the dataset here.
dataset-name (must match unique identifi.Bibtex: string (''): The bibtex citation for the dataset if Semantic Scholar Corpus ID is available, if not, please leave this field empty string. It can be generated using script src/data_bibtex.py
